auth.description: (Optional) The type of auth to use. Options are 'ApiKey', 'SecurityToken' and 'InstancePrincipal'. By default, 'ApiKey' will be used.

config_file_profile.description: (Optional) The profile name to be used from config file, if not set it will be DEFAULT.

disable_auto_retries.description:
(Optional) Disable automatic retries for retriable errors.
Automatic retries were introduced to solve some eventual consistency problems but it also introduced performance issues on destroy operations.

fingerprint.description: (Optional) The fingerprint for the user's RSA key. This can be found in user settings in the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure console. Required if auth is set to 'ApiKey', ignored otherwise.

private_key.description:
(Optional) A PEM formatted RSA private key for the user.
A private_key or a private_key_path must be provided if auth is set to 'ApiKey', ignored otherwise.

private_key_password.description: (Optional) The password used to secure the private key.

private_key_path.description:
(Optional) The path to the user's PEM formatted private key.
A private_key or a private_key_path must be provided if auth is set to 'ApiKey', ignored otherwise.

region.description: (Required) The region for API connections (e.g. us-ashburn-1).

retry_duration_seconds.description:
(Optional) The minimum duration (in seconds) to retry a resource operation in response to an error.
The actual retry duration may be longer due to jittering of retry operations. This value is ignored if the `disable_auto_retries` field is set to true.

tenancy_ocid.description: (Optional) The tenancy OCID for a user. The tenancy OCID can be found at the bottom of user settings in the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure console. Required if auth is set to 'ApiKey', ignored otherwise.

user_ocid.description: (Optional) The user OCID. This can be found in user settings in the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure console. Required if auth is set to 'ApiKey', ignored otherwise.
